title: WTB: Raw T206, non HOFer, Portraits
author: Wanaselja

posts.post_title: WTB: Raw T206, non HOFer, Portraits
posts.post_content:
Taking a break from big ticket items for a bit but still need something to collect. I'm going to start a raw, non-HOFer (want to keep this low dollar to start), non hat wearing, color gradient T206 portrait collection.

I'd be looking for VG copies with good color, centering etc etc etc but I'm not going to be too picky. Just nothing with any egregious defects on the front. I'm not looking to buy too many in one shot (1-3 at a time) and spread it out and take my time. 

PM or email [url]adamwanaselja@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking.

Out of the ones you are looking for, here are the ones I have that are ungraded.  Think I have the others in low to mid grade but graded.  Would give a nice discount for a group lot.  Let me know if interested.  

Downs - [url]https://www.t206cards.com/search?type=product&q=downs+[/url]

Barry - [url]https://www.t206cards.com/search?type=product&q=barry+[/url]

Dygert - [url]https://www.t206cards.com/search?type=product&q=dygert+[/url]

Krause - [url]https://www.t206cards.com/search?type=product&q=krause[/url]
Bumping this back up. Picked up a nice pair from Leon. If you have any VG portraits shoot me an email or PM. Thanks. Adam.
